abstract: Californians revert to level of water consumption that worries conservationists who had been encouraged by state's implementation of restrictions in 2015 amid severe drought; relatively rainy winter pressured politicians to lift restrictions that water experts. predicting increasingly arid future for state, want to retain.

headline.print_headline: California Water Use Rises, as Do Doubts Over Eased Limits
headline.main: As California Water Use Rises, Some Ask: Were Limits Eased Too Soon?

keywords.value: Metropolitan Water District of Southern California
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: Water conservation has declined since the state lifted a mandatory 25 percent cut after a relatively wet winter. And the drought has not gone away....
lead_paragraph: Water conservation has declined since the state lifted a mandatory 25 percent cut after a relatively wet winter. And the drought has not gone away.
